Chris, you don't have any source code to reproduce this do you?

I have fixed the NPE by inspection.

If you have the code that caused this, it would deserve another bug since it
would be a failure to resolve the type of something

Is there some way to log the name of the file being parsed when an exception is thrown?  I have a huge 
project which the indexer churns through and starts spitting out NPEs every now and then.
Vlad, can you add the file/line # to the output trace?
